document.full_text: in a wealthy enclave of california, strangely jovial banners on a theme of earthquake preparedness struck a jarring note for at least one observer.
document.title: out here | beverly hills, calif.: festive yet alarming, earthquake banners strike a surreal note
lines_and_colors: in a wealthy enclave of california, strangely jovial banners on a theme of earthquake preparedness struck a jarring note for at least one observer.
